body.title: TICKET COUNTER HOURS
body.text:
Monday-Friday

Opens 90 minutes before first departure

Saturday

Opens 75 minutes before first departure

Sunday

Opens 180 minutes before first departure

body.title: TSA
body.heading: Check current TSA wait times
body.text: Don't forget your boarding pass or security documents, and a valid government-issued ID - the Transportation Security Administration (TSA) will need them at the security checkpoints.

body.title: AIRPORT DETAILS
body.text:
Service Animal Relief Area: Located on the grassy area in front of the airport next to the rental car area. There is also an area inside near gate B11 that is under construction

Learn more about Salt Lake City International Airport
